jumboTron.title: OSVR Config
jumboTron.description: This utility will help you configure OSVR.

serverRootNotDefined.panelTitle: Could not find your OSVR Server directory.
serverRootNotDefined.panelDescription: OSVR-Config could not find the OSVR Server directory. Typically this is configured when you run the OSVR SDK or Runtime installers, but can be configured manually by setting the OSVR_SERVER_ROOT environment variable.

devices.panelDescription: Select a display from one of the following available displays to set it as the current display. Some HMDs require additional configuration - see the Samples page to see examples.
devices.overwriteWarning: Note: This will overwrite the current configuration.

samples.panelDescription: Select one of the following sample configurations to save it as the default configuration.
samples.overwriteWarning: Note: This will overwrite the current configuration.

startServer.title: Launch OSVR Server
startServer.description: Launch the OSVR Server on this machine, if not already running.

trackerViewer.title: Tracker Viewer
trackerViewer.description: The Tracker Viewer utility visualizes OSVR trackers and can be useful to check if an OSVR device is working properly.
trackerViewer.pathPlaceholder: OSVR path to track (leave blank to track head and hands). Enter multiple paths with a space between each.

directMode.title: Direct Mode
directMode.description: Enable or disable direct mode on your HMD.

labels.directModeEnabled: Auto-enable Direct Mode On Application Startup
labels.directDisplayIndexHelp: Use -1 to automatically find the right display index based on resolution or specify an explicit direct mode display index.
labels.directHighPriorityEnabledHelp: RenderManager will use a high-priority graphics device to render distortion and time-warp, if available.
labels.numBuffersHelp: Use 1 for front-buffer rendering or 2 for double buffering.
labels.renderOverfillFactorHelp: Specify a value between 1.0 and 2.0. A larger value may increase field of view slightly while moving your head, at the cost of performance.

window.title: Title
window.positionHelp: X and Y position determine the window location in extended mode.
window.positionFullscreenHelp: X and Y position determine which screen to make fullscreen in extended mode.

timeWarp.asynchronousHelp: Asynchronous Time-Warp performs the time-warp operation in a separate thread, rendering the time-warped image just prior to vsync even if the next frame has not completed rendering in time.
timeWarp.maxMsBeforeVSyncHelp: The amount of time prior to VSync reserved for rendering distortion correction and time-warp.

renderManager.timeWarpSettingsPanelDescription: Time-Warp reduces perceived latency by making small adjustments to the final image based on head movement.

plugins.nextPluginPlaceholder: Type the name of a plugin and click Add Plugin.
plugins.manualPluginsPanelHelp: Enable or disable manually loaded plugins from the following list of available plugins, or manually add a plugin by name below.
